Play 
There’re two ways to use the play button the first one is the same as the recording on the main screen. 
The other is when you already save your file and you want to listen/play it. 
		Pause 
There’re also two ways to use stop button the one the main screen if you want to pause your recording to restart it after and the one in your saved files to pause while listening at it. 
		Stop 
You will find stop button on the main screen to stop permanently your recording.
